name: Mamie Taylor

ingredients.name: Blended scotch (Compass Box Great King Street or The Famous Grouse Smoky Black)
Spicy ginger ale or ginger beer

preparation:
Use a blended scotch that’s not too mild, such as Compass Box Great King Street or The Famous Grouse Smoky Black, in this cocktail from Whiskey: A Spirited Story with 75 Classic & Original Cocktails.

Add the scotch and lime juice to a highball glass full of ice, top with the ginger ale, and stir briefly.

Garnish with a lime wedge.
